General.Name: Hyperscale Data, Inc.
General.Description: Hyperscale Data, Inc., through its subsidiaries, owns and/or operates data centers at which it mines Bitcoin in North America, Europe, the Middle East, and internationally. It operates through Technology and Finance; Sentinum; AGREE; Energy and Infrastructure; ROI; and TurnOnGreen segments. The company also offers colocation and hosting services, and products and services for various industries; commercial lending and trading through Ault Lending; : crane rental and lifting solutions provider for oilfield, construction, commercial and infrastructure markets; and askROI, which operates an AI-driven platform engineered to provide pertinent and unique data insights through integration with business specific data that pushes beyond the conventional uses of existing large language models as well as RiskOn. In addition, it is involved in hotel operations and other commercial real estate holdings; commercial electronics solutions with operations; provision of electric vehicle charging solutions; and operation of a social gaming platform. The company sells its products directly and indirectly through its sales force. It serves Bitcoin mining, generative AI and metaverse platform development, crane services, defense/aerospace, industrial, automotive, medical/biopharma, consumer electronics and textiles businesses. The company was formerly known as Ault Alliance, Inc. and changed its name to Hyperscale Data, Inc. in January 2023. Hyperscale Data, Inc. was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada.
General.Address: 11411 Southern Highlands Parkway, Las Vegas, NV, United States, 89141
